alert.note: Alert for Crook County Plains; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Weston County Plains; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 21 at 1:57PM MDT until July 22 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR MOST OF NORTHEAST WYOMING... .Very warm temperatures into the upper 90s and lower 100s will combine with very dry air and support minimum relative humidity of 10 percent or less Friday afternoon. Gusty southwest winds of 20 to 30 mph combined with the low rh would support critical fire weather conditions. In addition, isolated thunderstorms with very little rainfall will be possible in the late afternoon and early evening. Later Friday night, winds will shift northwest behind a cold front, gusting over 40 mph in some areas. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 314, 315, 316, 317, AND 318... The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Friday morning through Friday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 314 Northern Campbell, 315 Southern Campbell, 316 Crook County Plains, 317 Weston County Plains and 318 Wyoming Black Hills. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 8 percent. * LIGHTNING...Isolated dry thunderstorms will be possible in the late afternoon and evening. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A fire weather watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.

area.areaDesc: Crook County Plains; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Weston County Plains; Wyoming Black Hills
